trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement" /> objects.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Diese Klasse kann nicht vererbt werden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection> class allows you to programmatically access a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> objects.
